Title: Lord of the Flies
Plot: When a stunt on a local cable reality show goes horribly wrong resulting in a man's death, Doggett and Reyes investigate. But when flies pour out of the victims eye sockets, they find themselves relying on Scully's expertise and ask her to join the investigation.
GuestStars: Hank Harris, Samaire Armstrong, Michael Wiseman, Jane Lynch, Aaron Paul, Branden Williams, Erick Avari, Aeryk Egan
